title: Sound On: Labor Sec. Marty Walsh on Jobs
itunes:title: Sound On: Labor Sec. Marty Walsh on Jobs
description:
Guests: U.S. Labor Secretary Marty Walsh, Natixis Chief Economist Joe Lavorgna, Kristin Smith, Executive Director of the Blockchain Association, and Bloomberg Government reporters Emily Wilkins and Jack Fitzpatrick.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
